sections.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking “Accept All”, you consent to our use of cookies.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary cookies
sections.description:
These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website and cannot be disabled.
  • Host-next-auth.* – Used for user authentication and session state
  • Secure-next-auth.* – Used for user authentication and session state

sections.title: Analytics
sections.description: The _ga cookie collects information about how you use our website during your visit. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you.

sections.title: Advertisement
sections.description:
These cookies collect information about how you use our website. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you.

Cookies named _gads, _gpi, and _eoi are third-party cookies set on the website domain. These cookies are used by Google Ad Manager on behalf of the website to support:
  • Programmatic buyers frequency capping and ads personalization
  • Reservation frequency capping

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries in relation to the policy on cookies and your choices, please read our Privacy Statement or contact us
